radiographic_examinations.findings: There are no focal hepatic lesions. There is no intra- or extra-biliary dilation with the common bile duct measuring 3.5 mm. There is a large 1.9 cm gallstone in the gallbladder, which is mobile. There is mild wall edema with the wall of the gallbladder measuring 4 mm. The spleen is normal in size measuring 11 cm. There is no free fluid and no pericholecystic fluid. The partially visualized pancreas is normal. The right kidney measures 12.7 cm. The left kidney measures 10.7 cm without evidence of hydronephrosis, stones or masses. The abdominal aorta and IVC are normal.
